definition: leisure/relaxation/not working/idle/to enjoy leisure/to lie fallow
to rest/to stop doing sth for a period of time/to cease/(imperative) don't

sentences.english: During the holiday, tens of hundreds of people enjoy themselves on Quancheng square.
sentences.chinese: 假日期間，許多人在泉城廣場休閒。

sentences.english: A selection of long- sleeved casual shirts featuring contemporary and classic styles.
sentences.chinese: 精選的長袖休閒襯衫採用現代和古典風格。

sentences.english: Nudism, the council decided, was doing the resort more harm than good.
sentences.chinese: 委員會認定在休閒勝地的裸體行爲弊大於利。

sentences.english: Other facilities such as electronic Majong tables and chess board are offered to enrich your leisure time.
sentences.chinese: 公館爲您提供棋牌康樂設施，讓您充分享受休閒時光。

sentences.english: Leisure culture is characteristic of both poetry and secularity.
sentences.chinese: 休閒文化具有詩性和世俗性雙重品格。

sentences.english: B25 is an easy chair in compression-moulded birch with a surface of ash veneer.
sentences.chinese: B25休閒椅子的基礎表面材料是樺木單板。

sentences.english: Effect of long-term fallow and cultivation on soil fertility in rice-based cropping system .
sentences.chinese: 水旱輪作地區土壤長期休閒與耕種的肥力效應。

sentences.english: We believe, Lion Lake will be the best leisure communication platform in Southern China.
sentences.chinese: 我們相信，獅子湖會成爲南中國最好的休閒交流平臺。

sentences.english: The bathroom eliminates contented physiology requirement outside, still be recreational space changeably .
sentences.chinese: 浴室除滿足生理需求外，還可變爲休閒空間。

sentences.english: Go on a “staycation” Even though summer is ending, your ability to relax should not.
sentences.chinese: 即使夏天快要結束了，但你休閒的功夫不能下降。

sentences.english: Furthermore, this paper discusses the security measures on developing leisure sea-fishing tourism.
sentences.chinese: 並就發展休閒海釣旅遊的保障措施進行探討。

sentences.english: In the summer people dress in casual clothes like T-shirts and shorts.
sentences.chinese: 炎天，人們都穿休閒服裝，如T恤衫和短褲。

sentences.english: Choose your casual shoes based on what it means for you.
sentences.chinese: 選擇您的休閒鞋的基礎上這是什麼意思你。

sentences.english: Leisure life, even cow does not need to Work Like Cow now.
sentences.chinese: 休閒自在，現今的牛也不用做牛做馬了。

sentences.english: If it’s a business trip, I am clearly going to bring mostly business casual items.
sentences.chinese: 如果是一趟商務旅行，我主要會帶一些職業休閒裝。

definition: to return to old ways (a Confucian aspiration)/to turn back the clock/neoclassical school during Tang and Song associated with classical writing 古文/retro (fashion style based on nostalgia, esp. for 1960s)
to spend one's leisure time/to idle away the time
